timeline.message: feat(plugins): Add back ExtensionConfiguration but mark as deprecated

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Denotes that a class provides plugin configuration. Classes annotated with @PluginConfiguration
          
          
            
             * Denotes that a class provides plugin configuration. Classes annotated with [PluginConfiguration]
